channel.title: Adding Avatars (Please Help)
channel.description: I've seen people on here with Avatars, but I can't find out how they got those there. Help?

item.title: Adding Avatars (Please Help)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

The Wanderer:

Just curious mdog. you were a moderator once, so why do you not have an avatar? Is it just by choice?

When you lose/give up your staff position you lose the ability to choose an avatar, but if you already have one it doesn’t go away. (I believe)

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Avatars (Please Help)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Just curious mdog. you were a moderator once, so why do you not have an avatar? Is it just by choice?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Avatars (Please Help)
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:8, topic:401462”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=498522.msg3948302#msg3948302 date=1332082394]

Sorry for bumping an old topic.
But Kryptix have a avatar under his name. (and as far as I know he have never been in moparscape staff).

It’s also a award to people in some cases.

I’m pretty sure he’s a rsc section mod just they don’t use a badge for that. Same with vrunk or something like that.
[/quote]
It would show green stars under his name if he was a sectional moderator like it does for Zyle.[/quote]
Only in the sections you’re mod in. Kryptix used to be a mod. But basically, the ability to use avatars/custom titles has to be given to you by an administrator. I don’t think there are any set guidelines though.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Avatars (Please Help)
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

If you’re a community expert (not staff, but well respected),
If you’re a retired staff,
If you’re a staff member (admin/mod/section mod),

you’ll get an avatar.

Read full topic
